entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,84}{F813,1,401605}I have found a life of chaos in the{F801}world created through God's order.{F801}{F802}I doubt God ever accounted for that{F801}happening. I feel like whooping for{F801}joy...!{F801}{F802}I won't be silent anymore. First,{F801}let me thank you.{F801}{F802}You... and Kiyoharu, who summoned you{F801}all here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Akira\0{F87A,84}{F813,1,401601}By the way, you released the people in{F801}Shibuya, right?{F801}{F802}Can't say I approve of your unauthorized{F801}use of a Terminal, but...{F801}{F802}You made everyone's dreams come true.{F801}From the bottom of my heart, thank you{F801}for that.{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Hermit child\0{F87A,95}{F813,1,404012}But it hurts... Can I take them{F801}off, mom?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hermit woman\0{F87A,98}{F813,1,403302}What do I always tell you? You'll get{F801}sick from the Tormentor's poison if{F801}you do that.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hermit woman\0{F87A,98}{F813,1,403312}Kiyoharu was once a student who went{F801}to a famous private high school.{F801}{F802}But then the demons came to Tokyo,{F801}and everything about our life changed...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hermit child\0{F87A,98}I'm sorry I can't show you Tokyo like{F801}it used to be.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hermit child\0{F87A,98}I'm sorry I can't show you Tokyo like{F801}it used to be.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hermit woman\0{F87A,98}I still can't believe it... a war{F801}between angels and demons...{F801}{F802}If only we could have escaped from this{F801}hell on those angels' ark...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hermit woman\0{F87A,98}I still can't believe it... a war{F801}between angels and demons...{F801}{F802}If only we could have escaped from this{F801}hell on those angels' ark...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hermit child\0{F87A,98}Yeah. It's because we weren't God's{F801}chosen ones.{F801} {F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hermit child\0{F87A,98}Yeah. It's because we weren't God's{F801}chosen ones.{F801} {F801}

entry.source: {F812}Stiff woman\0{F87A,163}{F813,1,403312}I was once a doctor, you know, and I{F801}can tell you this for sure: once you're{F801}infected with Pluto's poison, that's it.{F801}{F802}We've tried amputating to isolate the{F801}poison... We autopsied everyone who{F801}fell victim, but it was no help at all.{F801}{F802}Akira's confirmed it. Once the poison{F801}is in your system, your days are{F801}numbered...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,99}{F813,1,403012}Now that Pluto is gone, his poison will{F801}also fade in time.{F801}{F802}For now, it's safe to say that we've{F801}retaken Tokyo for the sake of the{F801}generations to come...{F801}
